events: User initiates a secure login request to the cloud gateway
Identity provider verifies credentials and issues a multi-factor authentication prompt
System validates the one-time passcode and generates a session token
Load balancer routes the authenticated user to the internal dashboard service
Dashboard service fetches personalized data from the database and renders the UI
question: Arrange these system log entries in the correct order of a successful user authentication and session start.
hint: Cause precedes effect: identity verification must be completed before a session token is granted.
